# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the voice chat channel.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Use a unique name for each voice chat channel in your game.

## Accessing Properties

- **players**: The players connected to the channel.

items.description: The players connected to the channel.
items.name: players

title: name
